item.description:
Healer Shares

November 21st

7pm - 9pm

Cost $10 donation

Healer Share! We usually have Reiki in one room and Full Spectrum in the other room. Come on down and practice your healing. Give a healing and get one too!

Come on down and practice your techniques - we have a very diverse group of healers. In 2 hours, you'll get to experience the modalities above - plus others such as Shamanic, Quantum Touch, The Reconnection & Yuen Method to name a few - depending who shows up.

Don't gauge the number of attendees by the RSVP number, as we often have 15-30 people attending with 0 RSVP's.  If you would like to RSVP please click here....http://www.meetup.com/The-Metrowest-Reiki-Meetup-Group/events/calendar/

Lisa Campion carried on this tradition for more than a decade. As Lisa steps aside quietly to pursue other interests, a few of us will maintain the Solstice Healer Share tradition of fun, friendship and bringing benefit to others.

This is by far the best share in the area. Thank you Lisa.

 

UP COMING 2012 HEALER SHARE DATES:

December 12th


For more information email solsticehealing@yahoo.com or Call 508-533-0669
item.name: Healer Share
